Name: Aim Lab VR
About the game: About this game: Experience the #1 FPS Trainer in a whole new dimension! And, it’s still free! Grab the benefits from top tasks in Aim Lab including Gridshot, Spidershot, Microshot, Strafetrack, Sixshot, Spidershot, and Aqua Tile Frenzy. Full with their own VR specific leaderboards to champion. Utilize the flicking and tracking skills across other FPS VR games you play. Enjoy the sounds of the official VALORANT Champions theme “Die for You” ft. Grabbitz in our beautifully crafted music rhythm task featuring captivating environments that rotate in phases to reflect the agents Brimstone, Phoenix, and Sage. Hit the targets on the beat and enjoy the music! Finally, survive the night during the Targets of Terror. Endure waves of enemies (who are now super scary in VR) while battling through to protect yourself.
Meta Title: Aim Lab VR: Dec 22, 2021, Statespace and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Aim Lab VR? Check out the release date (Dec 22, 2021), developer insights from Statespace, and a complete game summary.
